text: The Lithuania women's national under-18 and under-19 is a national basketball team of Lithuania and is governed by the Lithuanian Basketball Federation. http://www.fiba.com/pages/eng/fc/FIBA/fibaStru/nfLeag/p/nationalfederationnumber/2135/nfProf.html It represents Lithuania in international under-19 and under-18 (under age 19 and under age 18) women's basketball competitions. ==See also== * Lithuania women's national basketball team * Lithuania women's national under-17 basketball team * Lithuania men's national under-19 basketball team ==References== U19 Category:Women's national under-19 basketball teams
title: Lithuania women's national under-19 basketball team
